
## Find Image Location in a Given Set of Locations {.unnumbered}


### Description

Find Image Location in a Given Set of Locations



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>find_location(locations, image)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table role = "presentation">
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="locations">locations</code></td>
<td>
A character vector of image names at each location.
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="image">image</code></td>
<td>
A character string: the image to locate.#'
</td></tr>
</table>


### Value

A character string representing the location name or NA if not found.
